author: kasini3000
body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Write a descriptive title.
- [X] Make sure you are able to repro it on the [latest released version](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases)
- [X] Search the existing issues.
- [X] Refer to the [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md).
- [X] Refer to [Differences between Windows PowerShell 5.1 and PowerShell](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/whats-new/differences-from-windows-powershell).

### Steps to reproduce

```
 Test-WSMan -ComputerName 'fe80::941a:8c3:cb01:220c' -Port 5985
```

my vm has ipv6 ,can be new-pssession.

note: bug or enhancement ? i don't know. choose please.

### Expected behavior

```console
output wsman info
```


### Actual behavior

```console
on ps v5.1:
Test-WSMan -ComputerName 'fe80::941a:8c3:cb01:220c' -Port 5985
Test-WSMan : WinRM 客户端无法处理该请求，因为连接字符串中指定的端口无效。 请验证端口，然后重试该请求。 有效值介于 1 和 65535 之间。 请更改端口值，然后重试该请
求。
所在位置 行:1 字符: 1
+ Test-WSMan -ComputerName 'fe80::941a:8c3:cb01:220c' -Port 5985
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidOperation: (:) [Test-WSMan]，InvalidOperationException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : WsManError,Microsoft.WSMan.Management.TestWSManCommand


on ps v7.3 preview 7:
Test-WSMan -ComputerName 'fe80::941a:8c3:cb01:220c' -Port 5985
Test-WSMan: 0x803380DB
```


### Error details

_No response_

### Environment data

```powershell
win+powershell5.1
win+powershell7.3.0-preview.7
```


### Visuals

_No response_

comments.author: dkaszews
comments.body: @iSazonov Are you sure about that? I always use IPv4  as `-ComputerName` at work and it works for `Enter-PSSession` and `Invoke-Command`.

comments.author: jborean93
comments.body: I don’t know if it works but try enclosing it with `[]`, e.g. `-ComputerName '[fe80::1]'`.

comments.author: kasini3000
comments.body:
hi @jborean93  

## PowerShell 7.3.0-preview.7：
```
PS C:\ProgramData\kasini3000> Test-WSMan -ComputerName 'fe80::941a:8c3:cb01:220c' -Port 5985
Test-WSMan: 0x803380DB

PS C:\ProgramData\kasini3000> Test-WSMan -ComputerName '[fe80::941a:8c3:cb01:220c]' -Port 5985
Test-WSMan: <f:WSManFault xmlns:f="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wbem/wsman/1/wsmanfault" Code="2150859046" Machine="d766d05ad6ab"><f:Message>WinRM 无法完成该操作。 请验证指定的计算机名称有效，可以通过网络访问该计算机，以及启用了 WinRM 服务 的防火墙例外并允许从此计算机中进行访问。 默认情况下，公用配置文件的 WinRM 防火墙例外仅限访问同一本地子网中的远程计算机。 </f:Message></f:WSManFault>
PS C:\ProgramData\kasini3000> Test-WSMan -ComputerName '[192.168.168.234]' -Port 5985
Test-WSMan: <f:WSManFault xmlns:f="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wbem/wsman/1/wsmanfault" Code="12005" Machine="d766d05ad6ab"><f:Message>WS-Management 无法连接到指定的目标: ([192.168.168.234]:5985)。 </f:Message></f:WSManFault>
PS C:\ProgramData\kasini3000> Test-WSMan -ComputerName '192.168.168.234' -Port 5985

wsmid           : http://schemas.dmtf.org/wbem/wsman/identity/1/wsmanidentity.xsd
ProtocolVersion : http://schemas.dmtf.org/wbem/wsman/1/wsman.xsd
ProductVendor   : Microsoft Corporation
ProductVersion  : OS: 0.0.0 SP: 0.0 Stack: 3.0
```

## powershell v5.1:
```
PS A:\pscode> Test-WSMan -ComputerName '[192.168.168.234]' -Port 5985
Test-WSMan : <f:WSManFault xmlns:f="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wbem/wsman/1/wsmanfault" Code="12005" Machine="d766d05ad6ab"><f:Message>WS-Management 无法连接
到指定的目标: ([192.168.168.234]:5985)。 </f:Message></f:WSManFault>
所在位置 行:1 字符: 1
+ Test-WSMan -ComputerName '[192.168.168.234]' -Port 5985
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidOperation: ([192.168.168.234]:String) [Test-WSMan]，InvalidOperationException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : WsManError,Microsoft.WSMan.Management.TestWSManCommand

PS A:\pscode> Test-WSMan -ComputerName '[fe80::941a:8c3:cb01:220c]' -Port 5985


wsmid           : http://schemas.dmtf.org/wbem/wsman/identity/1/wsmanidentity.xsd
ProtocolVersion : http://schemas.dmtf.org/wbem/wsman/1/wsman.xsd
ProductVendor   : Microsoft Corporation
ProductVersion  : OS: 0.0.0 SP: 0.0 Stack: 3.0
```

title: test-wsman ipv6 error
